summary: This is my modified version of goatk brilliant TNF Breezehome. It adds a basement with smithy and bath lounge and moves housecarl room downstairs and gives the whole house an amazing noble facelift. I will let the pictures to do talking.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][color=#cc4125][size=6][b][/b][/size][/color][center][color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img]
[/url][/b][/color]____________________________________________[/center] 

[size=4][color=blue][b]FRENCH TRANSLATION[/b][/color][b][color=white] FOR THIS MOD[/color][color=red] CAN BE FOUND [url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/viewtopic.php?f=188&t=17812]HERE
[/url][/color][/b][/size]________________________________________________________________________________________

[b][size=5][color=#b22222]MAKE A BACKUP SAVE IN A SAFE PLACE IN CASE SOMETHING GOES FUNKY WITH INSTALLING THIS MOD AND UNTIL YOU ARE SURE THIS MOD WORKS FOR YOU.[/color][/size][/b]
[b][size=5][color=#orange]DO RESET BREEZEHOME AND PURGE CELL BUFFER AFTER YOU'VE EMPTIED IT BUT BEFORE ACTIVATING MY MOD.[/color][/size][/b]

[size=6][b][color=#ff8c00]::: BREEZEHOME TNF ELIANORA'S FLAVOUR V.1.2 :::[/color][/b][/size]

[youtube]q1IYsnVqEpc[/youtube]

Goatk (The brilliant creator of the The Noble Family series) has retired
from Skyrim modding and left permissions for modder's to modify and improve TNF mods.

I wanted to try out modding Breezehome, my favourite Skyrim house ever, and since the BHTNF layout is already super awesome, all was left for me to slightly adjust the decór and add new items from some modder's resources.

ORIGINAL: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31222]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31222[/url]
_______________________________________

This is a remake of the vanilla Breezehome with Hearthfires. No other versions will be made by me, the mod is offered as is.

[b][size=5][color=#b22222]:: INSTALLATION ::[/color][/size][/b]

[b][size=5][color=#b22222]MAKE A BACKUP SAVE IN A SAFE PLACE IN CASE SOMETHING GOES FUNKY WITH INSTALLING THIS MOD.[/color][/size][/b]
[b][size=5][color=#orange]DO RESET BREEZEHOME AND PURGE CELL BUFFER AFTER YOU'VE EMPTIED IT BUT BEFORE ACTIVATING MY MOD.[/color][/size][/b]

NMM or drop the esp and bsa to your Skyrim/Data files. Recommended installing on a new game where the house or its upgrades have not yet been purchased.

[b][size=5][color=#b22222]:: REQUIREMENTS ::[/color][/size][/b]
- Skyrim up to date
- Hearthfires

[b][size=5][color=#b22222]:: CONFLICTS ::[/color][/size][/b][size=5]
- ELFX/Camping mods that alter lighting and effects in Breezehome, also ELFX - Enhancer.esp
- Skyrim Project Optimization (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/?)[/size]

[color=#ff8c00][size=5][b]:: FEATURES ::[/b][/size][/color]
- Basement: Smithing, bath lounge and Lydia's room
- Wizardy workstations
- Tons of safe storage
- Around 20 Hearthfires planters
- Mannequins and weapon displays
- Kids room that actually looks like a kids room OR PURCHASE ALCHEMY ROOM
- Trophy room

[b][size=5][color=#ff8c00]:: GENERAL OTHER STUFF ::[/color][/size][/b]
- Cleaned and hand-polished with TES5edit. The one deleted navmesh comes from the official DLC, not this mod
- Lighting is adjusted from the original TNF because it was way too dark with ENB
- No idea how this looks with ELFX
- Compatible with Detailed Whiterun, BUT backyard has some funky shrubbery you have to delete with console

You can go to Proventus Avenicci and purchase rooms as if everything was vanilla.

Purchase List :
Kitchen: Garden at the back, oven, foods, kitchen clutter
Loft: Blacksmith workshop, loft armoury area, trophy room
Bedroom: Main bedroom, underground hot spring
Living room: Living room, tower top
Alchemy Lab: Alchemy Lab on the loft instead of kids room, Enchanting table in the ground floor (next to dining area)
Child's room: Child's room in the loft, Alchemy Lab in the ground floor next to the Enchanting table
Become thane: Housecarl room (automatically)

[size=5][b][color=#b22222]:: INSTRUCTIONS FOR UPGRADING IF YOU ALREADY HAVE FULLY PURCHASED BREEZEHOME ::[/color][/b][/size]

1. Evacuate!! Pick up all items you want to keep in game and ask every NPC get out of the house, then leave the house.
2. Go to any other interior cell, such as Warmaiden's.
3. Make a NEW Save, then Quit to desk top.
4. Activate this mod "BHTNF.esp".
5. Load up the NEW Save, enter the house, check if everything works fine.

Check OK? Play!

Anything wrong? Do the following:
a. Reload the NEW Save(by step 3). Open console, type "pcb", press Enter. Then type "resetinterior whiterunbreezehome", press enter, leave console.
b. Save game. Play!

----Uninstall----
Do steps 12345ab but uninstall with NMM or delete BHTNF.esp at step 4.
____________________________________________________________

[size=5][color=#ff8c00][b]:: RECOMMENDED MODS ::[/b][/color][/size]
- Static Mesh Improvement Mod - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655[/url]
- Furniture and Clutter HD Texture - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4571]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4571[/url]
- aMidianBorn Whiterun - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38491]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38491[/url]
- Detailed Rugs - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29608/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29608[/url]
- Detailed Whiterun - [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12129]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12129
[/url]- Improved NPC sandboxing (make Lydia actually use all three floors: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376[/url]

- Anything HD textures
[i]These are not necessary, but they will make the house look as intended[/i]

[color=#8b4513]ENB in the screenshots is Somber ENB Lut Sepia[/color]

[size=5][b][color=#ff8c00]:: CREDITS ::[/color][/b][/size]
♦ Blary: Alchemy stuffs, book sets and other awesome resources
♦ Oaristys: AH MA ZING Modder's Resource Pack
♦ The_Funktasm: Morrowind textures and clutter
♦ InsanitySorrow for pillows, lantern, new textures.. ♥
♦ tueffelachtein for his modder's resources, but especially Upper Furniture set
♦ Lilith for the ready clutter and catering resources ♥
♦ Runspect for Resources for modders
♦ TESA folk for the Resource Kit
♦ BrettM: Glorious FPI project resource ♥
♦ LilaMue for the new silver cutlery
♦ Tamira/stroti for kitchen clutter
♦ New Lakeview manor meshes by mrpdean
♦ DarkRider for the paintings
♦ mikegemini for allowing me to use his noble bed retexture (Mike's Noble furniture - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5265]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5265[/url] [color=#b22222](for the red bed)[/color])
♦ stoverjm for new open books
♦ eldiabs for activators
____________________________________________________________

Don't hesitate to contact me if you need help. Enjoy!

[size=5][color=red][b]:: FAQ ::[/b][/color][/size]
Q: Lighting flickers! SMOKE FROM THE FLOOR WHERE THE FIRE PIT WAS!
A: Some other mod like ELFX or a camping mod is still affecting Breezehome. Load this after those or remove the offending changes for those mods in TES5Edit.
Q: WALLS DISAPPEAR! I CAN SEE INTO NOTHINGNESS!
A: It is the room bounds that determine what gets rendered in game and what not (why render upstairs if you're downstairs and can't even see it). I have no answer to as why a few people are suffering or wrongly placed bounds.
Q: I have something out of place/floating in the air/all containers are empty and I lost my shiz and you ruined my save and everything is f**ked.
A: Why did you install this without a backup save? Read the installation and other general info carefully, and try to install the mod again. Reset Breezehome (console [i]pcb[/i] and [i]resetinterior whiterunbreezehome[/i]) after leaving and emptying the house, but before activating my mod.
Q: I can't get downstairs, there is a floating piece of ground in my way
[size=3][color=red][b]A: USE THE CONSOLE TO REMOVE IT. Google markfordelete[/b][/color][/size]
Q: Can you make it compatible with X?
A: No, there's too many mods and I have too little time.
Q: Can you make a XYZ version without Hearthfires, for my 50 teen girl follower harem, and preferably a script that makes them all strip when I enter the house?
A: .....
No other version will be made, sorry, I have too many other things I want to work on. You are free to modify this house to your individual needs, as long as you don't upload it anywhere.
Also, please refrain from posting pictures of naked pixel ladies in the house gallery, if the sole object of the picture is boobs. I don't mind nudity in the house pictures, but when your naked follower in porn armour takes up 90 % of the picture, I really don't need it in the user submitted images of A HOUSE :)

[color=green][b][size=4]:: UPDATE LOG ::[/size][/b]
- Adjusted smoke effects downstairs
- Improved master bedroom storage and desk area
- Added shrines to Akatosh, Dibella, Zenithar, Julianos, Arkay, Kynareth, Stendarr
- Remade the tower, removed the massive display items and replaced it with custom storage for unique items (if you wish to use it for unique items, it's just staves/weapons/armor storage basically) and a few mannequins
- Added a telescope to the top of the tower
- Fixed bugs with items not being enabled properly when purchasing upgrades
- Added a little more clutter
- Improved the look of the weapon racks
- Updated the Home Decoration Guide to match the changes
[/color]
[size=5][color=#b22222][b]:: NEW PERMISSIONS SINCE 7th SEPT 2014, check the perms tab ::[/b][/color][/size][/center]
author: goatk and Elianora
